text: "jaime_lannister """ Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane , the Mountain """" .
tywin_lannister Attacking him was stupid .
tywin_lannister Lannisters do n't act like fools .
jaime_lannister Catelyn Stark took my brother .
tywin_lannister Why is he still alive ?
jaime_lannister Tyrion ?
tywin_lannister Ned Stark .
jaime_lannister One of our men interfered , speared him through the leg before I could finish him .
tywin_lannister Why is he still alive ?
jaime_lannister It would n't have been clean .
tywin_lannister Clean ... .
tywin_lannister You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you .
jaime_lannister I could care less what anyone thinks of me .
tywin_lannister Now that 's what you want people to think of you .
jaime_lannister It 's the truth .
tywin_lannister When you hear them whispering """" Kingslayer """" behind your back , does n't it bother you ?
jaime_lannister Of course it bothers me .
tywin_lannister The lion does n't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep .
jaime_lannister I did n't realize you placed such a high value on my brother 's life .
tywin_lannister He 's a Lannister . He might be the lowest of the Lannisters , but he 's one of us .
jaime_lannister So the lion does concern himself with the opinions of ..
tywin_lannister No , it 's not an opinion , it 's a fact !
tywin_lannister Hmm .
cersei_lannister You 're in pain .
eddard_stark I 've had worse , my lady .
cersei_lannister Perhaps it 's time to go home .
eddard_stark The South does n't seem to agree with you .
eddard_stark I know the truth Jon Arryn died for .
cersei_lannister Do you , Lord Stark ? Is that why you called me here , to pose me riddles ?
eddard_stark Has he done this before ?
cersei_lannister Jaime would have killed him .
cersei_lannister My brother is worth a thousand of your friend .
eddard_stark Your brother Or your lover ?
cersei_lannister The Targaryens we d brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure .
cersei_lannister Jaime and I are more than brother and sister . We shared a womb . We came into this world together . We belong together .
eddard_stark My son saw you with him .
cersei_lannister Do you love your children ?
eddard_stark With all my heart .
cersei_lannister No more than I love mine .
eddard_stark And they are all Jaime 's .
cersei_lannister Thank the Gods .
eddard_stark You 've always hated him .
cersei_lannister Hated him ? I worshiped him .
eddard_stark When the King returns from his hunt , I 'll tell him the truth .
cersei_lannister And what of my wrath , Lord Stark ? You should have taken the realm for yourself .
eddard_stark I 've made many mistakes in my life , but that was n't one of them .
cersei_lannister Oh , but it was .
ros Come here .

petyr_baelish No no no no ! Is that what they teach you up in the North ? And you-- wherever you 're from , do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound ? Either of you understand a thing that I 'm saying ?
ros Yes , My Lord .
petyr_baelish Let 's start over , shall we ? You be the man and you be the woman .
ros Why do n't you join us , My Lord ?
petyr_baelish I 'm saving myself for another .
ros What she does n't know wo n't hurt her .
petyr_baelish A stupid saying .
ros She must be very beautiful .
petyr_baelish No , not really . Impeccable bloodlines though .
ros I do believe my lord 's in love .
petyr_baelish For many years . Most of my life really .
ros Is she still married to him ?
petyr_baelish Oh no . He got himself killed before the wedding .
ros And what do you want ?
petyr_baelish Oh , everything , my dear . Everything there is .
theon_greyjoy You 're a very lucky girl . Do you know that ?
osha Where is it you come from ?
theon_greyjoy The Iron Islands .
osha They far away ?
theon_greyjoy You 've never heard of the Iron Islands ?
osha Trust me , you 've never heard where I 'm from neither .
theon_greyjoy Trust me , My Lord . You 're not living in the wilderness anymore .
osha And what 's that ?
theon_greyjoy Lord .
osha Why ?
theon_greyjoy Why ? What do you mean why ? My father is Balon Greyjoy , Lord of the Iron Islands .
osha What 's that got to do with you ? If your father 's lord , how can you be lord too ?
theon_greyjoy I will be lord after my father .
osha So you 're not lord now ?
theon_greyjoy No , you ... You having a go at me ? Is that it ?
osha I just do n't understand how you Southerners do things .
theon_greyjoy I 'm not a Southerner .
osha You 're from South of the wall . That makes you a Southerner to me .
theon_greyjoy You 're an impudent little wench , are n't you ?
osha Could n't say , My Lord . Do n't know what """" impunent """" means .
theon_greyjoy Impudent . It means rude . Disrespectful .
maester_luwin Theon Greyjoy ! The lady is our guest .
theon_greyjoy I thought she was our prisoner .
maester_luwin Are the two mutually exclusive in your experience ?
maester_luwin Chances are I wo n't be nearby the next time that happens .
osha I 'm used to worse than him .
osha I 'm used to men who could chew that boy up and pick their teeth with his bones .
maester_luwin Why did you come here ?
osha Did n't mean to come here . Meant to get much further South than this .
maester_luwin Why ? What are you afraid of ?
osha There 's things that sleep in the day and hunt at night .
maester_luwin Owls and Shadowcats and ... .
osha I 'm not talking about Owls and Shadowcats .
maester_luwin The """" things """" you speak of-- they 've been gone for thousands of years .
osha They was n't gone , old man . They was sleeping .
samwell_tarly I miss girls .
jon_snow Why is he alone ?
samwell_tarly One blast for a Ranger returning , two for Wildlings , three for ... .
jon_snow There 's no rider .
night_watch_stable_boy Whoa , boy , whoa .
jon_snow That 's my Uncle Benjen 's horse .
renly_baratheon Ned ! It 's Robert .
robert_baratheon I should have spent more time with you , shown you how to be a man .
robert_baratheon My fault . Too much wine , missed my thrust .
cersei_lannister Robert , my sweet ... .
robert_baratheon Out , all of you !
eddard_stark You damned fool .
robert_baratheon Paper and ink on the table , write down what I say .
robert_baratheon Give it to the council after I 'm dead .
eddard_stark I will .
robert_baratheon And my son Help him , Ned . Make him better than me .
eddard_stark I 'll , I 'll do everything I can to honor your memory .
robert_baratheon My memory .
eddard_stark Give him milk of the poppy .
barristan_selmy He was reeling from the wine .
eddard_stark No man could have protected him from himself .
lord_varys I wonder , Ser Barristan , who gave the king this wine ?
barristan_selmy His squire , from the king 's own skin .
eddard_stark His squire ? The Lannister boy ?
lord_varys Such a dutiful boy to make sure his Grace did not lack refreshment .
eddard_stark His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen .
lord_varys I 'm afraid those birds have flown .
khal_drogo The stallion who mounts the world , has no need for iron chairs .
daenerys_targaryen According to the prophecy , the stallions will ride to the ends of the world .
khal_drogo The earth ends at the black salt sea . No horse can cross the poison water .
daenerys_targaryen The earth does not end at the sea , there are many dirts beyond the sea .
khal_drogo Not dirt . Lands .
daenerys_targaryen Lands , yes ... .
khal_drogo Let 's speak no more of wooden horses and iron chairs .
daenerys_targaryen It 's not a chair . It 's a ... Throne .
khal_drogo Throne ?
daenerys_targaryen A chair for a King to sit upon , or a Queen .
khal_drogo A King does not need a chair to sit upon . He only needs a horse .
daenerys_targaryen Ca n't you help me make him understand ?
jorah_mormont The Dothraki do things in their own time , for their own reasons .
daenerys_targaryen My brother was a fool , I know , but he was the rightful heir to the Seven Kingdoms .
jorah_mormont Forgive me , Khaleesi , but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror did n't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right .
daenerys_targaryen And because he had dragons .
jorah_mormont Ah well , having a few dragons makes things easier .
daenerys_targaryen You do n't believe it .
jorah_mormont Have you ever seen a dragon , Khaleesi ? I believe what my eyes and ears report .
daenerys_targaryen Well , I 'll come with you .
jorah_mormont No no , do n't trouble yourself . Enjoy the market . I 'll rejoin you soon enough .
little_bird Psst , Jorah the Andal .
wine_merchant Virzetha gizikhven ! Mra qora ! Mra qora !
wine_merchant A taste for the Khaleesi ? I have a sweet red from Dorne , my lady .
daenerys_targaryen My son already has his name , but I 'll try your summerwine .
wine_merchant My Lady , you are from Westeros .
doreah You have the honor of addressing Daenerys of the House Targaryen .
wine_merchant Princess .
daenerys_targaryen Rise . I 'd still like to taste that wine .
wine_merchant That ? Dornish swill .
daenerys_targaryen You honor me , Ser .
wine_merchant The honor ... the honor is all mine .
rakharo Huh - uh , huh - uh .
wine_merchant You know there are many in your homeland that pray for your return , princess .
daenerys_targaryen I hope to repay your kindness someday .
jorah_mormont Rakharo .
rakharo Huh .
jorah_mormont Put down that cask .
daenerys_targaryen Is something wrong ?
jorah_mormont I have a thirst . Open it .
wine_merchant The wine is for the Khaleesi . It 's not for the likes of you .
jorah_mormont Open it .
jorah_mormont Pour .
wine_merchant It would be a crime to drink a wine this rich without at least giving it time to breathe .
daenerys_targaryen Do as he says .
wine_merchant As the princess commands .
wine_merchant Sweet , is n't it ? Can you smell the fruit , Ser ? Taste it , My Lord .
jorah_mormont You first .
wine_merchant Me ? I 'm afraid I am not worthy of the vintage .
daenerys_targaryen You will drink .
doreah Khaleesi ! Stop him !
jorah_mormont Come .
jeor_mormont You came to us as outlaws , poachers , rapers , killers , thieves .
samwell_tarly You 're allowed to look happy .
jon_snow I want to find my Uncle .
samwell_tarly I wish I could help you , but I 'm no Ranger .
samwell_tarly There 's honor in being a steward .
jeor_mormont Here you begin anew .
jon_snow I do , my lord .
jeor_mormont You 'll want to take your vow before a heart tree as your Uncle did .
jon_snow Yes , my lord .
jeor_mormont You 'll find a Weirwood a mile North of the Wall . And your old Gods too , maybe .
samwell_tarly my lord , might I go as well ?
jeor_mormont Does house Tarly keep the old Gods ?
samwell_tarly No , my lord .
samwell_tarly The Night 's Watch is my house now .
jeor_mormont As you wish , lad .
jaremy_rykker Rangers with me .
othell_yarwyck Builders !
maester_aemon Samwell , you will assist me in the rookery and library .
jon_snow Will I serve the Lord Commander 's meals and fetch hot water for his bath .
maester_aemon Certainly . And keep a fire burning in his chambers .
jon_snow Do you take me for a servant ?
maester_aemon We took you for a man of The Night 's Watch .
jon_snow May I go ?
maester_aemon As you wish .
samwell_tarly Jon , wait ! Do n't you see what they 're doing ?
jon_snow I see Ser Alliser 's revenge , that 's all .
pypar Fair ? I was singing for a high lord at Acorn Hall when he put his hand on my leg and he wanted to see my cock .
samwell_tarly I thought you were caught stealing a wheel of cheese for your starving sister ?
pypar You think I was gon na tell a bunch of strangers that a high lord tried to grab my cock ?
samwell_tarly Could you sing me a song , Pyp ? I 'd like to hear a song .
samwell_tarly Now listen to me . The old man is the Lord Commander of The Night 's Watch .
jon_snow I just , I always wanted to be a Ranger .
samwell_tarly I always wanted to be a Wizard .
renly_baratheon Lord Stark , a moment .
renly_baratheon He named you Protector of the Realm .
renly_baratheon She wo n't care .
eddard_stark And what should I do with a hundred swords ?
renly_baratheon Strike ! Tonight while the castle sleeps .
eddard_stark What about Stannis ?
renly_baratheon Saving the Seven Kingdoms from Cersei and delivering them to Stannis ?
eddard_stark Stannis is your older brother .
renly_baratheon This is n't about the bloody line of succession .
eddard_stark Stannis is a commander . He 's led men into war twice .
renly_baratheon Yes , he 's a good soldier . Everyone knows that . So was Robert . Tell me something Do you still believe good soldiers make good kings ?
eddard_stark I will not dishonor Robert 's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds .
eddard_stark You will sail to dragonstone tonight .
tomard Yes , My Lord .
eddard_stark Now leave us .
petyr_baelish My Lord protector .
eddard_stark The King has no true born sons .
petyr_baelish So when the King dies ... .
eddard_stark The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis .
petyr_baelish So it would seem . Unless ... .
eddard_stark There is no """" unless """" .
petyr_baelish And he can not take the throne without your help .
eddard_stark Do you have a shred of honor ?
petyr_baelish You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm .
eddard_stark We ?
petyr_baelish You 'll need someone to share these burdens . I assure you , my price would be modest .
eddard_stark What you suggest is treason .
petyr_baelish Only if we lose .
eddard_stark Make peace with the Lannisters , you say . With the people who tried to murder my boy . Petyr Baelish We only make peace with our enemies , my Lord .
eddard_stark No . I wo n't do it .
petyr_baelish So it will be Stannis and war ?
eddard_stark There is no other choice . He is the heir .
petyr_baelish So why did you call me here ? Not for my wisdom , clearly .
eddard_stark You promised Catelyn you would help me .
petyr_baelish Look at you . You know what you want me to do .
jon_snow@samwell_tarly Hear my words and bear witness to my vow .
othell_yarwyck You knelt as boys .
nights_watch_officer Well done . Well done .
samwell_tarly What 's he got there ?
samwell_tarly Gods be good !
daenerys_targaryen What will they do to him ?
daenerys_targaryen And when he falls ?
daenerys_targaryen King Robert still wants me dead .
daenerys_targaryen I thought he 'd leave me alone , now that my brother is gone .
daenerys_targaryen He will not have my son .
khal_drogo Moon of my life . Are you hurt ?
khal_drogo Jorah the Andal , I heard what you did .
messenger Lord Stark !
varly Stop !
eddard_stark No , all right .
messenger Lord Stark , King Joffrey and the Queen Regent request your presence in the Throne Room .
eddard_stark King Joffrey ?
messenger King Robert is gone .
petyr_baelish All is accomplished . The City Watch is yours .
eddard_stark Good . Is Lord Renly joining us ?
lord_varys I fear Lord Renly has left the city .
janos_slynt We stand behind you , Lord Stark .
messenger All hail his Grace , Joffrey of Houses Baratheon and Lannister , the first of his name , King of the Andals and the First Men , Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm .
joffrey_baratheon I command the council to make all necessary arrangements for my coronation .
eddard_stark Ser Barristan , I believe no man here could ever question your honor .
barristan_selmy King Robert 's seal . Unbroken .
cersei_lannister May I see that letter , Ser Barristan ?
barristan_selmy Those were the King 's words .
cersei_lannister We have a new King now .
joffrey_baratheon Liar !
cersei_lannister You condemn yourself with your own mouth , Lord Stark .
eddard_stark Ser Barristan is a good man , a loyal man . Do him no harm .
cersei_lannister You think he stands alone ?
joffrey_baratheon Kill him ! Kill all of them , I command it !
eddard_stark Commander ! Take the Queen and her children into custody .
janos_slynt Men of the Watch !
eddard_stark I want no bloodshed .
petyr_baelish Now !
petyr_baelish I did warn you not to trust me .
